questionTitle: The doctor gave the patient ..................... examination to discover the cause of his collapse.
scientists have observed increased pollution in the water supply.
We are grateful to our friends, ....................... have done everything for us in making the film.
We ....................... two hours on the matter, but we cannot find its solution.
We received her letter after she ....................... to a new house.
When you grow up, ....................... the truth.
Mrs. Green used to have her husband ....................... the dishes everyday.
She doesn't write to me as often as she ....................... .
The boss asked the secretary ....................... the report for him.
He failed in the last exam, ....................... he is studying hard to be able to pass in the next exam.
His parents never allowed him ........................
Most of the students are ....................... to pass the examination.
There was a sudden loud ..................... which made everyone jump.
She never says a word: she's as ..................... as a mouse.
After Smith had broken his leg, he could only go up and down stairs ....................
You will have to ..................... your holiday if you are too ill to travel.
The guide walked so ........... that most of the party could not keep up with him.
I can't go to school ....................... my mother is having flu.
They often smoke in the office. Tell them ....................... in the office.
